cause.description:
In recent years, there has been an ever increasing digital divide within middle-class American. The higher end of the spectrum has more access to more information much faster than the lower end of the spectrum.
One thing that lack of money should never take away is one's access to information.
China, Korea, and Japan are already years ahead of America as far as connecting their national population. With America lagging behind on many technological fronts, let's start by catching up on a technology that can benefit everyone
1. Everybody deserves access to the information they want or need.
2. America is far behind eastern Asia on terms of getting its population connected to the internet.
3. Broadband can benefit every person in America somehow.
cause.mission: Eliminate the digital divide and bring broadband to the masses.
cause.name: Connect America
